settings.title: Hero w/ Content & Imagery
settings.heading: The First Step on Your Skincare Journey
settings.paragraph: We’re thrilled that you’re considering stocking Medik8. We are on a journey to demystify anti-ageing skincare with a wide selection of products and transformative professional treatments that really work.

settings.title: Content w/ Sidebar Image
settings.block_paragraph_1: Medik8 was created by Elliot Isaacs, a pharmacologist and biochemist who built the brand with the intention of striving for better skin health and results. This passion for results still drives our business today in many ways. Since our launch in 2009, we have grown exponentially and Medik8 is now sold through distribution channels in over 25 countries. Medik8 is an easy choice for distribution; being a customer favourite with incredible results. We also offer superior support and training for our valued business partners.
settings.block_paragraph_2:
What’s the use in taking up shelf space with products that don’t deliver? Your customers want results, and results is something Medik8 truly delivers.

Medik8 products and professional treatments are profitable for clinics in many ways:

  • offering a comprehensive professional and retail product range

  • reasonable cost for excellent products

  • fuss-free ordering systems which saves your staff time

  • excellent training materials and workshops

  • beautiful point of sale and marketing materials

But most importantly for your business: amazing results guarantee customer loyalty for your clinics. By joining Medik8, you will be part of a community of pioneering skincare entrepreneurs.
settings.block_paragraph_3:
Our state-of-the-art training facility in the UK is our global hub for education and training.

At Medik8, we deliver in-market training, as well as an extensive programme of webinars covering various ingredients, technologies and focuses across the year. Practical training takes place annually (pandemics aside) at our extremely popular “Train The Trainer” event in London, UK. This event combines a mixture of theoretical and practical education to provide Education Managers with the latest information and techniques so they can return to their respective countries and educate their network of salons, spas, clinics and doctors with our Medik8 protocols. For more proficient trainers, we offer a series of London-based “Masterclasses” covering more detailed technologies.

Training and education are the heartbeat of Medik8. Our experienced team of international trainers and R&D specialists travel the world to deliver high-level education to thousands of business owners, distributors, trainers and therapists every year. We take a truly tailored approach to ensure the type and level of education delivered matches that of the audience: from therapists right through to dermatologists and doctors. Initial training is given followed by a programme of continuous learning “refreshers” to ensure trainers are following the latest techniques.
settings.block_heading_4: What do I have to do?
settings.block_paragraph_4: Find a local distributor in your country. It is best to email or call them directly to discuss stocking Medik8. If you can’t find a distributor local to you, please fill in our business enquiry form and someone from the Medik8 team will contact you.
settings.block_cta_text_4: Find a contact in my country
